events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return it because it’s not what I expected and I’d like a refund.
The reported case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer requesting a return and money back.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! I’m here to help you with the return and refund process. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed, I need to know the reason for your return and any issues you faced with the product.
The order number is 45789123. The product was fine but it just didn’t meet my needs, so I would like to return it and get a refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the return process and you will receive instructions shortly on how to send the item back for a full refund.
Thanks for helping me quickly. I appreciate the clear instructions and prompt response on the refund process.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please follow the email instructions to complete the return shipment.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to return the product and if the refund has been received to your satisfaction.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday and the refund appeared in my account today. Thanks for your help!
We’re glad everything was resolved smoothly. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your support experience so we can continue improving our service.
